text: if china carries on expanding its
presence in the Spratly Islands carries
on reclaiming land putting military
hardware on to those reclaimed reefs
what are you going to do about it well
the first thing is we're hoping that the
Chinese will not do that and the day and
the other claimants will agree to halt
further land reclamation and further
militarization and if they do and I hope
that they're that they will that all the
parties will agree to that nothing that
is done by any of the claimants
including Jan will affect US military
operations in this region at all we will
fly we will sail we will operate as we
always have for decades and decades you
mentioned the things that the u.s. is
already doing the flying the patrolling
the monitoring would you do more no
we're not looking to militarize the
situation or to escalate the situation
we will continue to do what we have
traditionally done out here for seven
decades now since world war to end we
play a pivotal role and that's a system
that has worked well for 70 years it we
got to keep a good thing going out here
